WI: Timur killed, not just disabled

While it's not clear exactly how Timur received the injuries that earned him the epithet "the Lame", what is clear is that the circumstances under which he received them could easily have killed him. Suppose they did kill him. How might things have changed?

AHC/WI: Timurid China

As the title says, an Imperial China ruled by the Timurids. What happens if Tamerlane or one of his successors conquered China and ruled the Middle Kingdom, similar to Mongol Yuan and Manchu Qing? How China would looked like under Timurid rule? Would it be like the Chinese version of Mughal Empire?
